title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
content: Guys, check this User out, He or she has just 1 post and also 1 activity, and as well as 1 merit earnedLooking at the 1 post from the said user, which is a comment on a thread in the gambling board, no body merited that comment, i visited the profile out of curiosity to try to understand how he got the 1 merit he earned if no body merited the 1 post he has made since he joined the forum, And I am still confused, how did he or she get that 1 merit ?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: The post which earned the user the merit has been deleted According to  Ninjastic  it was merited by ICOpress on the 25th of August 2022.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Based on ninjastic.space archive the user got merit from icopress[1]. He also created 29 posts all time from last year and 28 of them got deleted by mods or by him/her the one remains is the latest post he made this year.[1] https://ninjastic.space/user/znbdnv?meritsEdit: Check above reply, posted/edited while i'm still typing.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: He received the merit from icopress and i think the post was deleted by moderators thats why you can‚Äôt see it but you can take a proper look at his/her profile here

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Your question has been answered to. It would be good if you just lock this topic to avoid posts to be repeated by other members. Know that if the post is not more than 120 days, you can still be able to see the post deleted and who gave him the merit on the merit history page on this forum. If it is more than 120 days, you can use BPIP.org to check who gives him merit, or Ninjastic.space to know his post.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Nheer on July 21, 2023, 07:15:51 PMHe received the merit from icopress and i think the post was deleted by moderators thats why you can‚Äôt see it but you can take a proper look at his/her profile hereThe user's post are all complaints related to betnomi and it's a legit problem/complaint which was solved by betnomi's team which signature campaign handled by icopress. I don't think mods will delete those kind of posts, but the user itself since his problem/issue got resolved.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: https://ibb.co/Bc8YDnq][img]https://i.ibb.co/Bc8YDnq/mrit.pngFrom the image about it was given to that users at a gamble section through Betnomi.com threadhttps://ninjastic.space/user/id/3440683?meritsHowever, you don't need to get how the merits comes as I think there's always a way to get the system filled back by Theymos.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on July 21, 2023, 07:13:14 PMBased on ninjastic.space archive the user got merit from icopress[1]. He also created 29 posts all time from last year and 28 of them got deleted by mods or by him/her the one remains is the latest post he made this year.According to his profile on bpip.org, only 3 of his posts were deleted by moderators, which means that most of the posts were deleted by the user himself.

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: I think this forum should literally have a space for reactions....reeeeelll at the time .... Cus mahn, this is so hilarious üòÇ Saw some other funny post today too... I feel lame cus I can't react without commenting into Thier craps ...lol buh that isn't the case here... Only that you explained the whole scenerio in a way that really attached a moment of excessive credulousness... Lol.Ninjastic.space explais it allEdit: merited for the laughoutSandra üßë‚Äçü¶∞

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.created_time: July 21, 2023, 09:36:40 PMLast edit: July 21, 2023, 10:03:23 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on July 21, 2023, 07:10:51 PMThe post which earned the user the merit has been deleted According to  Ninjastic  it was merited by ICOpress on the 25th of August 2022.wohooo, ¬†How didnt i even think about this, it actually did not even cross my mind that the post that earned the Merit might have been deleted, thanks very much for the find, appreciate yah bud.Quote from: PX-Z on July 21, 2023, 07:13:14 PMBased on ninjastic.space archive the user got merit from icopress[1]. He also created 29 posts all time from last year and 28 of them got deleted by mods or by him/her the one remains is the latest post he made this year.[1] https://ninjastic.space/user/znbdnv?meritsI am just right now digging on ninjastic.space and finding all of this out, if actually all of those posts got deleted by mod, then i did scream Holy crap , He should be careful not to get a ban hammer though.Quote from: Sandra_hakeem on July 21, 2023, 08:35:00 PMI think this forum should literally have a space for reactions....reeeeelll at the time .... Cus mahn, this is so hilarious üòÇ Saw some other funny post today too... I feel lame cus I can't react without commenting into Thier craps ...lol buh that isn't the case here... Only that you explained the whole scenerio in a way that really attached a moment of excessive credulousness... Lol.Ninjastic.space explais it allEdit: merited for the laughoutSandra üßë‚Äçü¶∞Great idea bud, but on the other hand, dont you think users will start using reactions instead of smerit to appreciate or show how they feel about posts, which also could stagnate the growth of a lot of users, most especially , those who are not all that capable of creating really really quality posts?Anyways, still a great idea, and thanks for the merit by the way, I wasn't expecting that ¬†, happy you find the post amusing ¬†.EDIT, i dont think there is anything important to discuss here anymore, so i am locking the thread, thanks guys.
